subject: Basketball (College)
Officiating (Sports)
Uniforms
lead_paragraph: A longstanding N.C.A.A. edict, rooted in maintaining clarity in referees’ hand signals to the scorer’s table, prohibits players from wearing certain numerals.
snippet: A longstanding N.C.A.A. edict, rooted in maintaining clarity in referees’ hand signals to the scorer’s table, prohibits players from wearing certain numerals.
